name: Pink on Yellow
description: A vibrant oil painting featuring a striking contrast of pink hues against a bold yellow background. This piece brings warmth and energy to any space.

name: Flower paint
description: A delicate and elegant oil painting that captures the beauty of flowers in full bloom. Ideal for adding a touch of nature to your home.

name: Portrait yellow
description: A modern print that blends abstract forms with a rich yellow palette, perfect for those who appreciate contemporary art with a bold twist.

name: Sky Blue
description: A versatile artwork that can be displayed as either a print or oil painting. The soothing sky blue tones make this piece a calming addition to any room.

name: White and Brown
description: A sophisticated artwork combining the simplicity of white with the richness of brown. This piece is available as both a print and an oil painting, offering timeless elegance.

name: Blue Yellow
description: A captivating artwork that merges cool blue with vibrant yellow, creating a dynamic visual experience. Perfect as a print or oil painting.

name: Blue Red White
description: An eye-catching piece that uses the powerful combination of blue, red, and white. This artwork is available in both print and oil painting formats, adding a pop of color to your decor.

name: Gray Building
description: A minimalist depiction of a building in gray tones. This artwork is perfect for urban art lovers and is available in both print and oil painting versions.

name: Black and White Oil
description: A monochromatic masterpiece that emphasizes the depth and texture of oil paint. This piece is perfect for a modern, sleek aesthetic.

name: Fire Blue Yellow
description: An intense and fiery artwork that blends the coolness of blue with the warmth of yellow. Available as a print or oil painting, this piece will make a bold statement in any space.
